EmailTemplate.subject: Get Your Name Out There
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Premium Marking Solutions For Every Business Our online self-serve design tool lets you quickly create custom stamps, nameplates, badges, and more as easily as: <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm?cmp=EBBDCLEARANCEEN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> 1. Select Your Product 2. Edit Your Design 3. Add To Cart Get Started Now <[[ https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/en/sites/core/custom-stamps.aspx?cmp=SERVSTAMPEN18&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov]]>
